++ The Holy City of Luthadel
DRACONIC

A propogandic story of how [Venril Sathir] unified the ancient iksar tribes into [Luthadel]

        -[Luthadel] was founded by the ancient Iksar tribe Kunzar of [Kunark], Lead by Arch Duke Zog
        -Ancient tribes included Sarnak, Kunzar, Ry'Zok, Sel'Nok
        -the tribes were united thousands of years ago by [Venril Sathir]
        -The strong were glorified and the weak were purged, regardless of tribe
